overview: Dr. Worley investigates a 300-year-old witch's curse in the New England town of Devonsville. Three liberated, assertive women move into town, which angers the bigoted, male-dominated town fathers. One of the women is a reincarnation of the witch, who proceeds to exact revenge on them.
tagline: Three hundred years ago they burned her as a witch. Now she's back!
title: The Devonsville Terror
